title: Gregory Benford and Larry Niven - Bowl of Heaven (ePub/mobi) [20

Summary
Release Date: October 16, 2012
In this first collaboration by science fiction masters Larry Niven (Ringworld) and Gregory Benford (Timescape), the limits of wonder are redrawn once again as a human expedition to another star system is jeopardized by an encounter with an astonishingly immense artifact in interstellar space: a bowl-shaped structure half-englobing a star, with a habitable area equivalent to many millions of EarthsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s on a direct path heading for the same system as the human ship.

A landing party is sent to investigate the Bowl, but when the explorers are separatedÃ¢â‚¬â€one group captured by the gigantic structureÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s alien inhabitants, the other pursued across its strange and dangerous landscapeÃ¢â‚¬â€the mystery of the BowlÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s origins and purpose propel the human voyagers toward discoveries that will transform their understanding of their place in the universe.
